professional.title: Database Synchronization Service
description: Developed database synchronization microservice optimized for synchronizing deployments connected by intermittent, low-bandwidth network connections.
Service is designed to withstand network interruptions and resume synchronization when the connection is re-established ensuring at-least-once delivery.
Integrated with cross-functional, multi-company teams to deliver a scalable, reliable solution.
Technologies Used: Java, Kafka, Docker, Kubernetes, K3S, Helm, Jenkins, Git, JIra, Confluence

professional.title: AR/XR Training Remote Instruction System
description: Developed a HoloLens 2-based system to enhance medical training by enabling remote instructor feedback.
Improved the open-source HL2SS sensor streaming system to support real-time, low-latency interactions.
Integrated an instructor application allowing remote instructors to observe student perspectives and provide visual feedback using holograms and data displays.
Technologies Used: Unity, MRTK, RTSP, C#, Python, Websockets.

personal.title: Harry Potter Smart Home Wand
description: Designed and built a Harry Potter-inspired smart home wand using Raspberry Pi and Arduino.
Implemented a gesture recognition system enabling users to control lights, temperature, and other devices with wand movements.
Technologies Used: Python, C++, Raspberry Pi, Arduino.
